summary: Comprehensive testing of Gurukrupa Mess tiffin delivery app completed successfully. Backend: 12/12 tests passed (100%). Frontend: All critical user flows working correctly including customer login, admin login, navigation, checkout, order placement, order history, support page, and language toggle.

minor.issue: bcrypt version warning in logs: 'module bcrypt has no attribute __about__' - does not affect functionality

react_native_issues.issue: Console warning: 'props.pointerEvents is deprecated. Use style.pointerEvents' - minor deprecation warning
Console warning: 'shadow* style props are deprecated. Use boxShadow' - minor deprecation warning

action_items: Minor: Consider updating deprecated pointerEvents and shadow* props to use new React Native Web syntax
Optional: Update bcrypt library if needed (currently not affecting functionality)
critical_code_review_comments: ✓ All backend routes properly exclude MongoDB _id from responses
✓ JWT authentication properly implemented with token expiry
✓ All frontend interactive elements have testID attributes for testing
✓ React Native components used correctly throughout (View, Text, TouchableOpacity)
✓ API URL properly uses EXPO_PUBLIC_BACKEND_URL environment variable
✓ Error handling present in all frontend API calls
✓ Input validation present with Pydantic models
seed_data_creation: Seed data already created. Demo accounts working: Customer (rahul@test.com/test123), Admin (admin@gurukrupa.com/admin123). Database: test_database with 14 menu items, 3 subscription plans, demo orders.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All backend APIs and frontend flows tested and working. Mock Razorpay payment always succeeds as expected. Language toggle (English/Marathi) working correctly. Admin dashboard shows real-time stats from database. Only minor deprecation warnings present, not affecting functionality.

test_categories.authentication: 3/3 passed - Customer login, Admin login, Invalid login rejection
test_categories.orders: 2/2 passed - POST /api/orders, GET /api/orders with persistence verification

flows_tested: Home screen displays: greeting, today's special (Paneer Butter Masala), daily items, quick actions
Navigation to Menu tab → weekly menu with day selector working
Navigation to Plans tab → 3 subscription plans displayed (Weekly ₹490, Monthly ₹1800, Monthly 2 Meals ₹3200)
Navigation to Profile tab → user info, language toggle, logout button
Checkout flow: Order Now → quantity controls → address input → notes → place order
Order history page shows created orders with status badges
Support page: WhatsApp button, Call button, FAQs displayed
Admin dashboard stats: 5 orders, 4 today, 3 pending, 1 preparing, ₹480 revenue, 1 customer
Admin switch to user view working
Language toggle: English ↔ मराठी (Marathi) - UI text changes correctly

mobile_design_review.touch_targets: ✓ All buttons meet 44x44 minimum touch target requirement
mobile_design_review.contrast: ✓ Text has sufficient contrast with backgrounds
mobile_design_review.keyboard_handling: ✓ KeyboardAvoidingView present in login and checkout screens
mobile_design_review.responsive_design: ✓ App renders correctly on mobile viewport (375x667)
